gui.libraryferret.config_welcome:
Welcome to the configuration interface.

The list on the right display the property groups, once a group is selected you can click on the "option..." button (you can do the same with a double click on the desired item),  then the list will display you the properties of the selected group, select any property from the list to display it on the left panel.

Press the "back" button to return to the main screen which displays the groups.

For reset all config, open the file with the button "Open file" and delete the content then restart Minecraft.
gui.libraryferret.group.description.crea: Creative mode option, disable item group..
gui.libraryferret.props.description.bool: Enable or disable the "Ferret item" group in the creative menu. To completely disable items/blocks, use a custom datapack or use the mod KubeJS/Crafttweaker.
gui.libraryferret.requiresave.message: Do you want to save the changes applied to the configuration in the properties file? If you do not, your changes will be lost at the end of the minecraft instance.
gui.libraryferret.requiresave.title: Do you want to save the changes applied ?
